name: SMASHED
description:
You've been cut off and it's time to go get a taxi to go home. Try to avoid causing any trouble with the other patrons, and be sure to stay on your feet! Move the mouse to balance Arbor, W and S to move forward and backward, A and D to turn left and right. If you bump into someone be sure to apologize to de-escalate the situation.

Oh and try not to punch people (left and right mouse)

Our entry for UE4Jam - Summer 2018

Team Name: 

The Baguette Boiz

Team Members: 

Joel Hodges 

Rhys Lamble 

Name of Submission:

SMASHED

Previously Made Content:

SoundFX - Soundly (Super awesome bit of software!)

AI Animations - Mixamo

GameDNA's Realtime Database Plugin - Google Firebase

Music - Carl Phaser - FreeMusicArchive

Font - Homer Simpson by João Pereira - DaFont.com
